Posts.Content: Hi Phaedra  I am sorry for your loss You have a lot to deal with and you are bound to feel low xx  Sending big hugs of support x
Posts.Title: Emotions- can anyone relate?

Posts.Content: Congratulations - have a great day and best wishes for the future xx
Posts.Title: Good News Story for a cold Tuesday

Posts.Content: Hi everyone  Started rt on tuesday so 4 down just 11 to go.  I have followed advice posted here.  As soon as I get home the bra comes off and the cream gets slapped on all over - so far so good although my breast is a bit tender today - just can't believe how tired I get - does it get any better?
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy club

Posts.Content: Hi Debs  I was given a big tub of Zerobase Emollient cream to use 2 a day and a steroid cream applied at night.  Just taking 1 day at a time just now and staying positive.  I am so glad I found this forum it is helping so much  Margaret
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy club

Posts.Content: Thanks Maxine I wasnt sure if I was over reacting. I dont throw my arms up but it does take my breath away.
Posts.Title: Advice re breast pain

Posts.Content: Thanks Lynn I start my radiotherapy on Tuesday so will see if  bcn is around then. If not I will contact her by phone.   Dont feel just as alone now that I have joined this community
Posts.Title: Advice re breast pain

Posts.Content: Hi I had WLE at the beginning of March. The operation went well and I only need 15 sessions of radiotherapy which starts on Tuesday. Ober the past few weeks I have started getting quite sharp shooting pains in my breast. Is this normal or should I get in touch with BCN?
Posts.Title: Advice re breast pain

Posts.Content: Hope your op has gone well ❤
Posts.Title: Big op tomorrow!

Posts.Content: Hi London Lass I am glad today is looking brighter for you. Take care and stay strong xx
